meanings.def: used to express the cost or amount of something for each person, number used, distance travelled, etc.
examples: Rooms cost £50 per person, per night.
France consumes around 200 000 tonnes of cocoa per year.
This country has a higher crime rate per 100 000 of the population than most other European countries.

meanings.def: following something that has been decided
examples: The work was carried out as per instructions.

meanings.def: in the way that is normal or usual; as often happens
examples: Everyone blamed me as per usual.
